sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_sow_walkup.SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_sow_collab.SOWContextualPanelVisibility for walkup Interactions</description>
        <name>SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility = Class.create();
SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility.prototype = {

    canLaunchChat: function(recordSysId, table) {
        if (table == 'interaction' && new sn_sow_collab.SOWSidebarChatUtils().isSidebarSupportedOnSOW())
            return true;

        if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.ms_teams.it') && table == 'interaction') {
            var type = '';
            var intGr = new GlideRecord('interaction');
            if (intGr.get(recordSysId)) {
                type = intGr.getValue('type');
                return type == "walkup" && new sn_tcm_collab_hook.MSTeamsChatUtil().canLaunchChat(intGr, 'sn_walkup.walkup_technician');
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-12-20 08:33:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2f768ca987ec4d10359b52c73cbb35f4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SOWContextualPanelWalkupVisibility</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Walk-up Experience for Service Operations Workspace" source="sn_sow_walkup">2290bab1eb4e3010e0ef83c45e5228b5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Walk-up Experience for Service Operations Workspace">2290bab1eb4e3010e0ef83c45e5228b5</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f768ca987ec4d10359b52c73cbb35f4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-15 17:10:44</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
